item.title: Modification of the temple hugo theme to allow custom code highlighting
item.author: your@email.com (Your Name)
item.description: I respect the design of the temple theme for hugo and it’s goal of been minimal, lightweight and fast - it’s formed a great background framework for this design of an Electronic Lab Notebook. However, I always like a darker theme for my code (writing and highlighting) and I couldn’t find a ‘simple’ solution in terms of editing the config.toml (though my css isn’t up to scratch and I’m sure there is a nice way there…).
